attributes.action: Give Henrik Larsson A Knighthood for His Contributions To Scottish Football.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For Many years while Henrik Larsson was at celtic the english media said he couldnt do the job in the Premiership. He Is a great football player and deserves a knighthood because he is a perfect role model for young football players. all the top players hold him in high regard even Thierry Henry after the 2006 champions league final in paris where Larssons Team Barcelona Beat Arsenal 2-1.. With Larsson Coming on as a sub and making the difference.
